description: The 2q37 copy number variation syndrome can result in the loss of up to 78 protein-coding genes. Patients with 2q37 CNV syndrome had intellectual disability, facial dysmorphism and skeletal and digit malformations (DOI: 10.1186/1755-8794-7-19,DOI: 10.1016/j.gene.2013.06.056). Research linked changes in HDAC4 gene with obesity of 2q37 patients (DOI: 10.1016/j.gene.2013.06.056).
title: 2q37 copy number variation syndrome
